name: Launch and Safety Officer
description: Negotiation with 10+ launch sites for the launch of a UK record-breaking 20km, 5kN hybrid rocket. Safety procedure regarding Nitrous Oxide pressure vessels for cold flow and hot fire testing.

name: Propulsion Intern
description: An internship involving the creation of a modular analytical suite to model spacecraft propellant feed systems on the basis of waterhammer protection and nominal performance.

name: Mars Re-Entry, Descent and Landing Simulation
description: A realistic Martian environment with complete 3D dynamics, and a Mars lander with two PID controllers, equipped with a genetic optimisation algorithm and real-time orbital trajectory prediction.
